amendment.description: SEC. 514. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to implement, administer, or enforce the prevailing wage requirements in subchapter IV of chapter 31 of title 40, United States Code (commonly referred to as the Davis-Bacon Act).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to implement, administer, or enforce the prevailing wage requirements under what is commonly known as the Davis-Bacon Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A043) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 235 (Roll no. 191).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the King (IA) amendment (A043) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 235 (Roll no. 191).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A043) offered by Mr. King (IA).
